lead_paragraph: The two-time Olympian Abdi Abdirahman successfully defended his 10-kilometer road racing national championship in Richmond, Va.. Abdirahman won in 28 minutes 32 seconds, beating Dan Browne by four seconds. Leah Kiprono won the women’s race in 34:19.
